  • Constructor Details

    • SettingsManager

      public SettingsManager(int adminID)
      Create a new SettingsManager with given adminID.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • checkExistenceHol

      public boolean checkExistenceHol(String name)
      Check if Holiday of given name exists.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of Holiday to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if Holiday exists.

    • checkExistencePrice

      public boolean checkExistencePrice(String movieType, String cat)
      Check if Price of given movieType and category exists.
      Parameters:
      movieType - Movie Type to be checked.
      cat - Category to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if Price with given movieType and category exists.

    • printHolidayList

      public void printHolidayList()
      Prints all Holiday.

    • addHoliday

      public void addHoliday()
      Adds a new Holiday to the database. Name of Holiday needs to be unique.

    • updateHoliday

      public void updateHoliday()
      Update an existing Holiday. Name of Holiday will be used to identify the Holiday to be changed..

    • deleteHoliday

      public void deleteHoliday()
      Deletes a Holiday. Name of Holiday and Date will be used to identify Holiday to be deleted.

    • printPriceList

      public void printPriceList()
      Prints all Prices.

    • editPrices

      public void editPrices()
      Change price of existing Price. Movie Type and Category will be used to identify the Price to be changed.
